It is provided "as is" without express or implied 34 // warranty. 35 42 #ifdef PB_DS_CLASS_C_DEC 43 44 PB_DS_CLASS_T_DEC 45 inline void 46 PB_DS_CLASS_C_DEC:: 47 constructor_insert_new_imp(mapped_const_reference r_val, size_type pos, 48 false_type) 49 { 50 // Following lines might throw an exception. 51 entry_pointer p = get_entry(r_val, traits_base::s_no_throw_copies_indicator); 52 53 // At this point no exceptions can be thrown. 54 p->m_p_next = m_entries[pos]; 55 m_entries[pos] = p; 56 _GLIBCXX_DEBUG_ONLY(debug_base::insert_new(r_key);) 57 } 58 #endif
